documents.document: @oneofthosefaces Janelle is Queen of the universe and whoever wrote this garbage can take a seat.
@rosiepercy This belongs to my all time least favourite genre of tweets, but I still love it. DAMN YOU *shakes fist*
@oneofthosefaces Excuse you, Spy is fucking incredible
@kitlovelace @oneofthosefaces This is actually so good I can even forgive the heinous album artwork.
@iggigg Ten years on and this still gets funnier: https://t.co/8psrg4uTRH
@mrdiscopop Wow. I struggled to get into her second album, but this really is BS.
I'd rather have non stop Katy Perry concerts, and I fucking hate Katy Perry. https://t.co/LVyAHKAmfm
@CmonHarris Hopefully yeah, provided I can get everything done this afternoon. Is it a 7 start?
@CmonHarris I usually love days like this, but I'm working from home and my office is so much warmer than my flat.
@willpooool hells yeah.
@willpooool mate you should be, you look ripped! May grill you for fitness advice a little.
Thanks everyone for the free publicity you're giving a comedian whom no-one has looked twice at in years, great work
@J9andIf I enjoyed my breakfast but I wasn't planning a reunion with it, cheers
@iggigg you're really running with this theme, and I respect that so much
@scottygb @youngvulgarian Really good! Could never decide if the over-zealous marketing ruined Skins for me or if I was just...too old?
@youngvulgarian Is this the new 'hard working families'?
@BeeBabs Everyone needs the Craig David to their Sofia Vergara, though.
@otterpizza if you can ignore the noises, you have got yourself a deal
@otterpizza it's Tabata. It's awful for everyone.
@otterpizza I'm going to bring my workout clothes and we can do the Tabata stuff together. Like a boss. Or two bosses.
@HRFMichael It looks like it'll have to be Sunday since it's only on in the afternoon Friday. Meet you at 6.30?
@HRFMichael So here for this. Also: are we still on for Yeeeeeah Jackie this weekend?
@HRFMichael That headline. Ewan could never have as much contempt for Piers' audience as Piers does himself.
@Mullane45 I cheered massively when it beat that DiCaprio borefest to Best Picture (although it should have been Mad Max)
@J9andIf I love that this requires no context or explanation at all
Can't believe I missed the non stop thrill ride of "I don't care about the Oscars BUT" tweets. Oh well, maybe next year,
@mdpattison @oneofthosefaces He knows pretty well that Meryl's work will outlive his own, that's the real beef here
@oneofthosefaces @mdpattison T2 will smash anyway, they needed Ewan more than he needs them. Hopefully others in same position follow suit
@oneofthosefaces So disingenuous. She knows better than anyone that nothing involving Piers is ever going to be a debate.
@octojon He only got cast because they needed one person who could actually sing, let's be honest.
Emily Gilmore just threw shade at paella. I quit this show.
@NotRollergirl Girl, you'd better try to have fun, no matter what you do.
@CmonHarris It could have done with a song as brilliantly/terribly crowbarred into the film as You Haven't Seen The Last Of Me.
Also: Dev Patel totally deserves an Oscar nomination but is he seriously going Supporting? Because that makes no sense at all.
All sorts of feelings after watching Lion. So sad, so uplifting, so beautifully acted.
@Ankaman616 I saw the trailer for this at the cinema tonight and spent the whole thing trying to work out who she was.
@AGlasgowGirl She has to be the ultimate cautionary tale about marrying rich. Their first dance was so "creepy uncle-by-marriage"
@heyjamiedrew I looked at the PCC for next weekend but nothing jumping out so far
@heyjamiedrew I SO wanted to see this but they kept putting it on at stupid times
The Last Airbender, actually. So close. https://t.co/7Mlzl2Psta
@Czaroline Oh God, I think I counted the ceiling tiles about six times during Silence.
@DrinkxDraino @spacegirlgail He sent me a reply as well, which I didn't read. Muted straight away.
@spacegirlgail Imagine if he ever actually met one.
this tweet is EVERYTHING. https://t.co/sD8u1ICPy4
@heyjamiedrew @willpooool some outstanding Blue Steel in that second pic
@SuperCracko How she manages to sit next to that absolute knobcheese every morning and not lamp him one, I will never know.
@fubarpops See if you can find it in glass bottles, because that is the best
@Mullane45 11/10 for life choices
@freddiewrites That location algorithm is working its magic, I see
(First and last engagement with any of this bullshit; total media blackout all weekend)
Remember when our biggest inauguration worry was whether BeyoncÃ© sang live or not? Good times.
@4r7hr @kitlovelace also: it didn't happen at Wimbledon.
@EwaSR the use of 'cabinet' and 'assembled' in this sentence, I LIVE
@fubarpops this is v high on my list of Twitter related pet peeves
@heyjamiedrew Agreed, but it's still a no. There's a reason the expression doesn't extend to 'fool me three times'
W&G had the opposite problem to most other shows: it was ONLY funny when they had a famous guest star on it.
Screaming is right; we're still not rid of The Big Bang Theory and now they dig this trash out of the grave. https://t.co/WihvSfYqgR
Totally avoiding the inauguration on Friday by going to Dishoom and eating a metric shit tonne #betterlifedecisions
@stevenperkins my thoughts exactly. That, and I thought the sound mixing was a little off.
@CmonHarris Week on Friday, so maybe couple of days after? Only last 2 films have been shit, I'm hoping it's just a slump.
@CmonHarris Rewatched it last night too (I saw it at the cinema, because I am 100). Part 2 in a couple of weeks?
I forget who said they've never hated anyone like the Sun hates its readers, but they were bang on. https://t.co/exOpCrJpzT
@kitlovelace If you have to tell people it's witty...
@stevenperkins The final Dexter is the funniest episode of TV produced in the last decade, hands off
If necessary, of course. Some sequels made 20 years after the original are actually good, such as...
About to rewatch Trainspotting, mostly so I can really get the carving knives out for T2
@ceebrie I did this in the uni library once and got through the whole of the Strokes' Is This It. Apparently no-one minded.
@spacegirlgail TREASON. The 'movie remake' clips may be the hardest I've ever laughed in a cinema.
@Webbo_init I marked one down because the non-Robyn version of Dancing On My Own came on the radio and he didn't turn it off immediately
@otterpizza I am SO HERE for this level of snark, it becomes you
@oneofthosefaces Album version was amazing, but that horrible single edit ðŸš®ðŸš®ðŸš®
@MintRoyale And I think any relevance Jamiroquai had to R1's demographic was pretty much gone even by then.
@MintRoyale Just over six years apparently. Can't believe it's been that long since Cheryl and Dannii's amazing snub on X Factor.
@MintRoyale He's a year younger than Dave Grohl, but I think it might be an issue of perception rather than actual age in this case.
I mean, if you can't rely on Shyamalan for a right load of hilarious nonsense, what is the world even coming to
Starting to worry that Split might be 'good' which is bad news because @heyjamiedrew and I were going to drunk-watch and laugh copiously
@EwaSR not as glad as she is, I would imagine
@EwaSR I always wish you could hear the other half of the conversation, then you get to pick a side
@otterpizza we tell ourselves what we need to tell ourselves
@otterpizza TABATA? Brave words, very brave.
@CmonHarris for a minute I thought you meant the similarly titled Radiohead song, which would also be amazing
@ChrisMonk I have a lot less faith in Danny Boyle after Trance and Steve Jobs, sadly

@ChrisMonk You wouldn't be suggesting that there's a reason why nobody's seen it yet, would you?
(you're probably right)
Oh, Glasgow. Never change. https://t.co/K4A0q7UVgW
@CmonHarris @fubarpops Clearly, we need to find out where the best pub roast in Edinburgh is and go there.
@J9andIf @NatashaHodgson Ryan Gosling was verging on Pierce Brosnan in Mamma Mia levels of bad singing
@alicebeepea Hear'Say's Show Me The Way To Your Love fits perfectly over the Celine track and vice versa.
@willpooool Can we see the after picture, because I'm assuming you burnt this immediately
I've got a sudden urge to rewatch Titanic. Someone talk me out of it. https://t.co/lXbUTw6sto
@fubarpops hello, is that Social Services?
@SuperCracko the fucking least of their problems, let's be real
@willpooool I'm doing a half marathon in October on much the same principle
Quite liked La La Land but was expecting to giant-caps LOVE it. Maybe watch Whiplash again?
@spacegirlgail You managed to find two hours of your life for Assassin's Creed, but not Singin' In The Rain until today? GAIL.
@DrinkxDraino I've seen so much of this and it pisses me off the most. It's been out TWO FUCKING DAYS.
The Xx and Sohn: two brilliant albums already, and it's only January 14th. THANK YOU 2017.
@ashleyfryer I was worried it might have been too subtle, but obviously not :)
@ashleyfryer cool tweet
@iggigg I mean, they're Birds Eye. None of your Co-op own brand nonsense.
@oneofthosefaces it used to be on YouTube but looks like they've taken it down, the BASTARDS
